alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES, NORTHERN TERREBONNE, NORTHWESTERN LAFOURCHE AND SOUTHEASTERN ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Des Allemands to near Amelia. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Cut Off, Larose, Galliano, Lockport, Mathews, Schriever, Paradis, Gray, Des Allemands, Chauvin, Raceland, Bayou Gauche, Montegut, Bayou Cane, Boutte, and Dulac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
